Translations.Text: tanna odeyana vacanagala mulaka upadesisalpatta balikavu adannu kadeganisi bittavaniginta dodda akrami yariddane? Khanditavagiyu navu aparadhigala virud'dha pratikara tirisuvevu

navu i hinde musarige, granthavannu nididdevu. Avanannu (allahanannu) bhetiyagaliruva kuritu nivu sansaya talabedi (endu adaralli upadesisalagittu). Navu adannu (a granthavannu) bani isra'ilara santatigalige margadarsiyagisiddevu
avaru sahanasilaragiddaga, navu avaralli kelavarannu nayakaragisiddevu. Avaru nam'ma adesadante janarige margadarsigalagiddaru mattu nam'ma vacanagalalli acala visvasa ullavaragiddaru
nim'ma odeyanu, avaru paraspara bhinnate talidda ella visayagalannu punarut'thana dina khandita ityarthagolisuvanu

navu avariginta hindina adesto samudayagalannu nasa madiruvudu, avara palige margadarsiyagalillave? Avara (hinde nasagondavara) nelegalalli avaru nadedaduttare. Idaralli khandita puravegalive. Avarenu keluttillave

Avaru nodalillave, navu onagida nelada kadege nirannu harisuvudannu? Adarinda navu beleyannu horategeyutteve. Adannu avara januvarugalu tinnuttave mattu svatah avaru tinnuttare. Avarenu (idannella) noduttillave
nivu satyavantaragiddare, tirpina a dina yavaga banditu(endu tilisiri) endu avaru heluttare
heliri; tirpina a dina, dhikkarigalige avara nambikeyinda yava labhavu agadu mattu avarige heccina kalavakasavu sigadu
(dutare,) nivu avarannu kadeganisiri mattu kayiri. Avaru khandita kayuttiddare
dutare, allahanige anjiri mattu dhikkarigalannu hagu kapatigalannu anusarisabedi. Allahanu khandita ellavannu balla yuktivantanagiddane
